<!-- Use this template for clear bug reports and feature requests. Keep reproducible steps minimal and concrete. -->
# Summary
One-line summary of the problem or request.

# Reproduction
1. Steps to reproduce (exact commands, pages visited, payloads).
2. Expected behavior.
3. Actual behavior (include logs or error messages).

# Environment
- OS / browser / Node version (if relevant).
- Repo branch and commit (if applicable).

# Screenshots / Logs
Attach screenshots, error traces, or network request dumps.

# Additional context
Any other details (related PRs, migrations, links to docs).
